tweet.text: In 2015, Secretary Albright donated her personal papers to @librarycongress, where she had performed dissertation research decades before. This collection of materials related to her service as a foreign policy expert and diplomat is open to the public: https://t.co/vqSpzvfXSO https://t.co/3RqBzKZpUU
tweet.html: In 2015, Secretary Albright donated her personal papers to @librarycongress, where she had performed dissertation research decades before. This collection of materials related to her service as a foreign policy expert and diplomat is open to the public: ow.ly/aCsl50IwEo5
